class.name: KolmogorovSmirnovDistributionTest
class.javadoc:
Test cases for {@link KolmogorovSmirnovDistribution}.
$Id: KolmogorovSmirnovDistributionTest.java 1364028 2012-07-21 00:42:49Z erans $

method.name: testCumulativeDensityFunction
method.comment: The code below is generated using the R-script located in srctestRKolmogorovSmirnovDistributionTestCases.R
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.005), n = as.integer(200), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 4.907829957616471622388047046469198862537e-86
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.02), n = as.integer(200), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 5.151982014280041957199687829849210629618e-06
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.031111), n = as.integer(200), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.01291614648162886340443389343590752105229
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.04), n = as.integer(200), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.1067137011362679355208626930107129737735
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.005), n = as.integer(341), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 1.914734701559404553985102395145063418825e-53
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.02), n = as.integer(341), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.001171328985781981343872182321774744195864
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.031111), n = as.integer(341), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.1142955196267499418105728636874118819833
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.04), n = as.integer(341), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.3685529520496805266915885113121476024389
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.005), n = as.integer(389), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 1.810657144595055888918455512707637574637e-47
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.02), n = as.integer(389), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.003068542559702356568168690742481885536108
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.031111), n = as.integer(389), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.1658291700122746237244797384846606291831
formatC(.C("pkolmogorov2x", p = as.double(0.04), n = as.integer(389), PACKAGE = "stats")$p, 40) gives 0.4513143712128902529379104180407011881471
